lyric:
[00:02.76][00:00.28]ah ah ~ ah ah~
[00:13.24][00:07.34]ah ah ~ah~
[00:13.46]Do we fight to hold our heads up high,
[00:15.83]And beat the drum to what we love?
[00:20.57]Risk the fall, oh we have felt it all,
[00:23.17]Come crashing down from far above.
[00:27.09]Stars arising, countless worlds colliding,
[00:29.81]Only one will take it all.
[00:32.50]Can we bring to fall the giants,
[00:35.99]Can we make the final call.
[00:41.24]We are the ones,
[00:44.00]To ignite the darkened skies.
[00:48.15]The champions,
[00:50.50]Of a world that we defy.
[00:54.95]A solemn reign,
[00:57.29]Of the few who rise up high.
[01:00.53]And we all fight,
[01:03.84]At the last light.
[01:13.96]Hearing voices from afar,
[01:17.30]Join the madness when the curtain falls.
[01:20.74]Risk it all, hold nothing back,
[01:23.74]Seize the day, we must attack.
[01:27.63]Stars arising, countless worlds colliding,
[01:30.32]Only one will take it all.
[01:33.22]Can we bring to fall the giants,
[01:36.35]Can we make the final call.
[01:40.64]We are the ones,
[01:42.89]To ignite the darkened skies.
[01:47.18]The champions,
[01:49.61]Of a world that we defy.
[01:53.81]A solemn reign,
[01:56.05]Of the few who rise up high.
[01:59.44]And we all fight,
[02:02.63]At the last light.
[02:06.69]Ah Ah~ Ah Ah~
[02:13.47]Ah Ah~ Ah Ah~
[02:20.13]Ah Ah~ Ah Ah~
[02:25.71]Can we bring to fall the giants.
[02:33.09]Ah Ah~ Ah Ah~
[02:35.43]Can we bring to fall the giants.
[02:39.49]Ah Ah~ Ah~
[02:41.70]Can we bring to fall the giants.
[02:46.09]Ah Ah~ Ah Ah~
[02:48.39]Can we bring to fall the giants.
[02:52.88]Ah Ah~ Ah Ah~
[02:59.43]We are the ones,
[03:01.49]To ignite the darkened skies.
[03:05.80]The champions,
[03:08.00]Of a world that we defy.
[03:12.40]A solemn reign,
[03:14.48]Of the few who rise up high.
[03:17.98]And we all fight,
[03:21.22]At the last light.
